name: Grab the Bottle
description: Grab the Bottle is a puzzle game in which you solve puzzles by stretching an infinitely stretchy arm through various levels, grabbing and dropping objects along the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: x86-compatible 1.8GHz or faster processor, SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 2 GB available space
